name: Fortress Invasion
description:
This game was made for the Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022

Wanna x Yam Game Jam 2022

This is a medieval fortress city living happily, till one day a zombie invasion came to take over the city. You are a a couple weapons that can shoot and destroy incoming enemies. Do so for as long as you can.

You the key A & D to move your cannon, and  either Click or Space to shoot.

Maximize game for best experience

Memorize The Number At The Top and Use it on the Combination Lock To Move On To The Next Level...
